gurmukhi: pRwn mIq prmwqmw purKoqm pUrw [
transliteration: praan meeth paramaathamaa purakhotham pooraa |a
translation: The life patron of Puranas, is the perfect Supreme Soul.

gurmukhi: poKnhwrw pwiqswh hY pRiqpwln aUrw [
transliteration: pokhanehaaraa paathisaah hai prathipaalan ooraa |a
translation: Har, the Sustaining Lord, is not deficient in protection.

gurmukhi: piqq auDwrn pRwnpiq sd sdw hjUrw [
transliteration: pathith oudhaaran praanapath sadh sadhaa hajooraa |a
translation: Hail! Manifested is the Supreme Being in the countenance of gallant Guru Gobind Singh,

gurmukhi: vwh pRgitE purK BgvMq rUp gur goibMd sUrw [
transliteration: vaah pragattiou purakh bhagavanth roop gur gobindh sooraa |a
translation: Who is spectacular, and with his marvels, profusely he is Satguru, the True Lord.

gurmukhi: And ibnodI jIA jip scu scI vylw [
transliteration: anadh binodhee jeea jap sach sachee vaelaa |a
translation: Remember day and night, the virtues of Har who, at the times honest, endows truth.

gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG Awpy gur cylw ]14]
transliteration: vaah vaah gobindh singh aapae gur chaelaa | 14 |
translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

gurmukhi: auh guru goibMd huie pRgitAw dsvyN Avqwrw [
transliteration: ouh gur gobindh hue pragattiaa dhasavae avathaaraa |a
translation: Guru Gobind Singh manifested as the tenth incarnation.

gurmukhi: ijn AlK Akwl inrMjnw jipE krqwrw [
transliteration: jin alakh akaal niranjanaa japiou karathaaraa |a
translation: He inspired the meditation upon the imperceptible, timeless and flawless Creator.

gurmukhi: inj pMQ clwieE Kwlsw Dir qyj krwrw [
transliteration: nij panth chalaaeiou khaalasaa dhar thaej karaaraa |a
translation: And initiated the Khalsa Panth, the Religious Path of Righteousness, and bequeathed scintillating splendour.

gurmukhi: isr kys Dwir gih KVg ko sB dust pCwrw [
transliteration: sir kaes dhaar gehi kharrag ko sabh dhusatt pashaaraa |a
translation: Head high with full tresses, and the sword in hand, (the Panth) eliminated the adversaries,

gurmukhi: sIl jq kI kC phir pkiVE hiQAwrw [
transliteration: seel jath kee kash pehar pakarriou hathiaaraa |a
translation: Wearing the breaches, the symbol of chastity, raised the arms,

gurmukhi: sc Pqy bulweI gurU kI jIiqE rx Bwrw [
transliteration: sach fathae bulaaee guroo kee jeethiou ran bhaaraa |a
translation: Roaring the war-cries of Victory to the Guru, prevailed in the immense battlefields,

gurmukhi: sB dYq Airin ko Gyr kir kIE pRhwrw [
transliteration: sabh dhaith arin ko ghaer kar keeou prehaaraa |a
translation: Rounded up all the devilish foes and annihilated them.

gurmukhi: jb sihjy pRgitE jgq mY guru jwp Apwrw [
transliteration: jab sehijae pragattiou jagath mai gur jaap apaaraa |a
translation: And then docilely manifested the appraisal of great Guru in the world.

gurmukhi: XoN aupjy isMG BujMgIey nIlMbr Dwrw [
transliteration: yo oupajae singh bhujangeeeae neelanbar dhaaraa |a
translation: Thus descended the young Singhs, the lions, like the rain showers from the blue sky,

gurmukhi: qurk dust siB CY kIey hir nwm aucwrw [
transliteration: thurak dhusatt sabh shai keeeae har naam ouchaaraa |a
translation: Who eliminated all the Turk (ruling Muslim) enemies and promoted the God's Name.

gurmukhi: iqn AwgY koeI n TihirE Bwgy isrdwrw [
transliteration: thin aagai koee n thehiriou bhaagae siradhaaraa |a
translation: None dared to face them, and all the chieftains took to their heels.

gurmukhi: jh rwjy Swh AmIrVy hoey sB Cwrw [
transliteration: jeh raajae shaah ameerarrae hoeae sabh shaaraa |a
translation: The kings, sovereigns and emirates, all of them were decimated.

gurmukhi: iPr sun kir AYsI Dmk kau kWpY igir Bwrw [
transliteration: fir sun kar aisee dhamak ko kaa(n)pai gir bhaaraa |a
translation: With high pitched drum-beats (of victory), even the mountains shuddered.

gurmukhi: qb sB DrqI hlcl BeI Cwfy Gr bwrw [
transliteration: thab sabh dharathee halachal bhee shaaddae ghar baaraa |a
translation: The upheaval ruffled the earth and people forsook their domiciles.

gurmukhi: ieauN AYsy duMd klyS mYN KipE sMswrw [
transliteration: eio aisae dhundh kalaesh mai khapiou sansaaraa |a
translation: In such a conflict and distress, the world was absorbed.

gurmukhi: qih ibnu siqgur koeI hY nhIN BY kwtnhwrw [
transliteration: thehi bin sathigur koee hai nehee bhai kaattanehaaraa |a
translation: And there was none else than the True Guru who could eradicate the fright.

gurmukhi: gih AYsy KVg idKwieAn ko skY n Jylw [
transliteration: gehi aisae kharrag dhikhaaeian ko sakai n jhaelaa |a
translation: He (the True Guru), beholding the sword, displayed the feats bearable to none.

gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG Awpy gur cylw ]15]
transliteration: vaah vaah gobindh singh aapae gur chaelaa | 15 |
translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.

gurmukhi: gurubr Akwl ky hukm soN aupijE ibigAwnw [
transliteration: gurubar akaal kae hukam so oupajiou bigiaanaa |a
translation: With the command of the Timeless, the Supreme True Guru, proclaimed the self-realisation,

gurmukhi: qb sihjy ricE Kwlsw swbq mrdwnw [
transliteration: thab sehijae rachiou khaalasaa saabath maradhaanaa |a
translation: And then, steadfastly, created Khalsa, the righteous ones, with the undefiled human form.

gurmukhi: ieauN auTy isMG Bbkwir kY sB jg frpwnw [
transliteration: eio outhae singh bhabakaar kai sabh jag ddarapaanaa |a
translation: The Singhs rose up roaring and whole world was over-awed.

gurmukhi: mVI dyvl gor msIq Fwih kIey mYdwnw [
transliteration: marree dhaeval gor maseeth taahi keeeae maidhaanaa |a
translation: They decimated and raised to the ground the (ritualistic) cemeteries, crematoriums, temples and mosques.

gurmukhi: byd purwn Kt swsqRw Pun imty kurwnw [
transliteration: baedh puraan khatt saasathraa fun mittae kuraanaa |a
translation: (Compulsive) readings of Vedas, Puranas, Six-shastras and Quran was abolished.

gurmukhi: bWg slwq imtwie kir mwry sulqwnw [
transliteration: baa(n)g salaath mittaae kar maarae sulathaanaa |a
translation: Baangs, the calls for Muslim prayers, were ousted and the kings were abolished.

gurmukhi: mIr pIr sB Cip gey mzHbo aultwnw [
transliteration: meer peer sabh shap geae mazaabo oulattaanaa |a
translation: Temporal and spiritual leaders were obscured, and all the religions became topsy-turvey.

gurmukhi: mlvwny kwjI iPir Qky kCu mrmu n jwnw [
transliteration: malavaanae kaajee fir thakae kash maram n jaanaa |a
translation: The Muslim priests and justices deciphered hard but could not comprehend dissolution.

gurmukhi: lK pMifq bRhmn joqkI ibK rs aurJwnw [
transliteration: lakh panddith brehaman jothakee bikh ras ourajhaanaa |a
translation: Millions of Brahamin scholars and astrologers were venomously entangled,

gurmukhi: Pun pwQr dyvl pUij kY Aiq hI Brmwnw [
transliteration: fun paathar dhaeval pooj kai ath hee bharamaanaa |a
translation: And were drowned in extreme fallacies of worshipping the idols and gods.

gurmukhi: ieauN dono iPrky kpt mYN rc rhy indwnw [
transliteration: eio dhono firakae kapatt mai rach rehae nidhaanaa |a
translation: Thus, both the ignorant faiths, muffled in hypocrisy, were lagging behind.

gurmukhi: ieh qIsr mzhb ^wlsw aupijE prDwnw [
transliteration: eih theesar mazehab khaalasaa oupajiou paradhaanaa |a
translation: Then the third religion, Khalsa, manifested triumphantly.

gurmukhi: ijin guru hoibMd ky hukm soN gih KVg idKwnw [
transliteration: jin gur hobindh kae hukam so gehi kharrag dhikhaanaa |a
translation: By the command of Guru Gobind Singh, they brandished the swords held high.

gurmukhi: iqh sB dustn kau Cyid kY Akwl jpwnw [
transliteration: thih sabh dhusattan ko shaedh kai akaal japaanaa |a
translation: They exterminated all the scoundrels and order of the Timeless One.

gurmukhi: iPr AYsw hukm Akwl kw jg mYN pRgtwnw [
transliteration: fir aisaa hukam akaal kaa jag mai pragattaanaa |a
translation: And this way they revealed the command of the Timeless in the world.

gurmukhi: qb suMnq koie n kir skY kwipE qurkwnw [
transliteration: thab sunnath koe n kar sakai kaapiou thurakaanaa |a
translation: Turks, the Muslims, dreaded and none actuated the circumcision

gurmukhi: ieauN aumq sB muhMmdI Kip geI indwnw [
transliteration: eio oumath sabh muhanmadhee khap gee nidhaanaa |a
translation: Consequently, the following of Mohammed submerged in ignorance.

gurmukhi: qb Pqy fMk jg mY Gury duK duMd imtwnw [
transliteration: thab fathae ddank jag mai ghurae dhukh dhundh mittaanaa |a
translation: Then the drumbeats of victory terminated all the adversities.

gurmukhi: ieauN qIsr pMQ rcwieAnu vf sUr ghylw [
transliteration: eio theesar panth rachaaeian vadd soor gehaelaa |a
translation: And thus was proclaimed the great and valorous Third Faith.

gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG Awpy guru cwlw ]16]
transliteration: vaah vaah gobindh singh aapae gur chaalaa | 16 |
translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.
